name: Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme
description: Provides coverage of up to Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year for medical and surgical procedures
description_tamil: ஒரு குடும்பத்திற்கு ஆண்டுக்கு ரூ. 5 லட்சம் வரை மருத்துவ மற்றும் அறுவை சிகிச்சை செலவுகளுக்கு காப்பீடு
benefits: Coverage of Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year, Cashless treatment in network hospitals, Coverage for pre-existing diseases

eligibility.income: Family income less than Rs. 72,000 per annum
eligibility.other: Yellow or white ration card holder

documents_required: Ration card, Aadhaar card, Income certificate
application_process: Apply online at https://www.cmchistn.com/ or visit nearest Primary Health Centre

name: Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Assistance Scheme
department: Social Welfare and Nutritious Meal Programme
description: Financial assistance of Rs. 18,000 to pregnant women for first two children
description_tamil: கர்ப்பிணி பெண்களுக்கு முதல் இரண்டு குழந்தைகளுக்கு ரூ. 18,000 நிதி உதவி
benefits: Rs. 18,000 paid in installments during pregnancy and post-delivery

eligibility.income: Family income less than Rs. 72,000 per annum
eligibility.residence: Tamil Nadu resident for at least 3 years
eligibility.other: For first two children only, Institutional delivery mandatory

documents_required: Pregnancy registration card, Aadhaar card, Bank account details, Income certificate
application_process: Register at nearest Government Hospital or Primary Health Centre

name: Amma Two Wheeler Scheme
description: Subsidy for purchase of mopeds/scooters for working women
description_tamil: வேலை செய்யும் பெண்களுக்கு மொபட்/ஸ்கூட்டர் வாங்க மானியம்
benefits: 50% subsidy up to Rs. 25,000 for purchase of two-wheeler

eligibility.income: Annual family income between Rs. 2.5 lakhs to Rs. 10 lakhs
eligibility.other: Should be employed (government/private/self-employed)

documents_required: Income certificate, Employment proof, Aadhaar card, Driving license
application_process: Apply online through Tamil Nadu e-District portal

name: Free Laptop Scheme for Students
description: Free laptops/tablets to students who pass Class 11 and join Class 12
description_tamil: 11-ம் வகுப்பு தேர்ச்சி பெற்று 12-ம் வகுப்பில் சேரும் மாணவர்களுக்கு இலவச மடிக்கணினி
benefits: Free laptop or tablet device

eligibility.other: Students passing Class 11 in Government/Government-aided schools and joining Class 12

documents_required: School ID, Class 11 marksheet, Aadhaar card
application_process: Automatic distribution through schools

name: Chief Minister's Solar Powered Green House Scheme
name_tamil: முதலமைச்சரின் சூரிய சக்தி பசுமை இல்லத் திட்டம்
description: Subsidy for establishment of solar-powered green houses for horticulture
description_tamil: தோட்டக்கலைக்கான சூரிய சக்தி பசுமை இல்லங்களை நிறுவ மானியம்
benefits: 50% subsidy up to Rs. 28 lakhs per hectare

eligibility.other: Farmers or Farmer Producer Organizations with minimum 0.2 hectare land

documents_required: Land ownership documents, Aadhaar card, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through District Horticulture Office

name: Kalaignar Insurance Scheme for Life Saving Treatments
name_tamil: கலைஞர் உயிர் காக்கும் சிகிச்சை காப்பீட்டுத் திட்டம்
description: Additional insurance coverage of Rs. 5 lakhs for critical illnesses
description_tamil: முக்கியமான நோய்களுக்கு கூடுதலாக ரூ. 5 லட்சம் காப்பீடு
benefits: Rs. 5 lakhs coverage for specified critical illnesses and procedures

eligibility.income: Family income less than Rs. 72,000 per annum
eligibility.other: Eligible under CM's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme

documents_required: CMCHIS card, Medical certificates, Aadhaar card
application_process: Through empaneled hospitals under CMCHIS

name: Free Bicycle Scheme for School Students
description: Free bicycles to students studying in Classes 11 and 12 in government schools
description_tamil: அரசு பள்ளிகளில் 11 மற்றும் 12-ம் வகுப்பு படிக்கும் மாணவர்களுக்கு இலவச மிதிவண்டி
benefits: Free bicycle

eligibility.other: Students in Classes 11 and 12 in Government/Government-aided schools

documents_required: School ID, Aadhaar card
application_process: Distribution through schools

name: Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar Higher Education Assurance Scheme
name_tamil: மூவலூர் இராமாமிர்தம் அம்மையார் உயர்கல்வி உறுதித் திட்டம்
description: Monthly assistance of Rs. 1,000 to girl students from 6th to 12th standard
description_tamil: 6-ம் வகுப்பு முதல் 12-ம் வகுப்பு வரை படிக்கும் பெண் மாணவிகளுக்கு மாதம் ரூ. 1,000
benefits: Rs. 1,000 per month deposited directly to student's bank account

eligibility.other: Girl students studying in Classes 6 to 12 in Government schools

documents_required: School certificate, Bank account (in student's name), Aadhaar card
application_process: Register through school

name: Adi Dravidar Housing Scheme
description: Financial assistance for construction of houses for SC/ST families
description_tamil: SC/ST குடும்பங்களுக்கு வீடு கட்ட நிதி உதவி
benefits: Rs. 3 lakhs for house construction (Rs. 1.5 lakhs State + Rs. 1.5 lakhs Central)

eligibility.income: Below Poverty Line (BPL)
eligibility.other: Should own land (minimum 3 cents), Should not own pucca house

documents_required: Caste certificate, Land documents, Income certificate, Aadhaar card, BPL card
application_process: Apply through District Adi Dravidar Welfare Office

name: Kalaignar All Village Integrated Agriculture Development Programme
name_tamil: கலைஞர் அனைத்து கிராம ஒருங்கிணைந்த வேளாண்மை மேம்பாட்டு திட்டம்
description: Comprehensive agricultural development support including irrigation, seeds, and training
description_tamil: நீர்ப்பாசனம், விதைகள் மற்றும் பயிற்சி உள்ளிட்ட விரிவான வேளாண்மை மேம்பாட்டு ஆதரவு
benefits: Subsidies for farm equipment, irrigation facilities, quality seeds, training programs

eligibility.other: Farmers with agricultural land

documents_required: Land ownership documents, Aadhaar card, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through District Agriculture Office or Agricultural Extension Centers

name: Chief Minister's Breakfast Scheme
description: Free nutritious breakfast to students from Classes 1 to 5 in government schools
description_tamil: அரசு பள்ளிகளில் 1 முதல் 5-ம் வகுப்பு மாணவர்களுக்கு இலவச சத்தான காலை உணவு
benefits: Free breakfast daily during school days

eligibility.other: Students studying in Classes 1 to 5 in Government primary schools

documents_required: School enrollment
application_process: Automatic - served in schools

name: Old Age Pension Scheme
department: Social Welfare and Nutritious Meal Programme
description: Monthly pension for destitute and poor senior citizens
description_tamil: ஆதரவற்ற மற்றும் ஏழை முதியவர்களுக்கு மாதாந்திர ஓய்வூதியம்
benefits: Rs. 1,000 per month for 60-79 years, Rs. 1,500 per month for 80+ years

eligibility.income: Annual family income less than Rs. 24,000 (rural) / Rs. 36,000 (urban)
eligibility.residence: Tamil Nadu resident for at least 5 years
eligibility.other: Destitute with no regular income source

documents_required: Age proof, Income certificate, Aadhaar card, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through Village Administrative Officer or Corporation/Municipality office

name: Widow Pension Scheme
department: Social Welfare and Nutritious Meal Programme
description: Monthly pension for destitute widows
description_tamil: ஆதரவற்ற விதவைகளுக்கு மாதாந்திர ஓய்வூதியம்
benefits: Rs. 1,000 per month

eligibility.income: Annual family income less than Rs. 24,000 (rural) / Rs. 36,000 (urban)
eligibility.residence: Tamil Nadu resident for at least 5 years
eligibility.other: Widowed and destitute with no regular income

documents_required: Husband's death certificate, Income certificate, Aadhaar card, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through Village Administrative Officer or Corporation/Municipality office

name: Differently Abled Pension Scheme
department: Social Welfare and Nutritious Meal Programme
description: Monthly pension for differently abled persons
description_tamil: மாற்றுத்திறனாளிகளுக்கு மாதாந்திர ஓய்வூதியம்
benefits: Rs. 1,500 per month

eligibility.income: Annual family income less than Rs. 24,000 (rural) / Rs. 36,000 (urban)
eligibility.residence: Tamil Nadu resident for at least 5 years
eligibility.other: 40% or more disability certified by medical board

documents_required: Disability certificate (40%+), Income certificate, Aadhaar card, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through Village Administrative Officer or Corporation/Municipality office

name: Pudhumai Penn Scheme
description: Monthly assistance of Rs. 1,000 to girl students pursuing higher education
description_tamil: உயர்கல்வி படிக்கும் பெண் மாணவிகளுக்கு மாதம் ரூ. 1,000
benefits: Rs. 1,000 per month for undergraduate studies

eligibility.income: Annual family income less than Rs. 2.5 lakhs
eligibility.other: Pursuing UG degree in Government/Government-aided colleges, First graduate in family

documents_required: College admission proof, Income certificate, Community certificate, Aadhaar card, Bank account
application_process: Apply online through Tamil Nadu e-District portal
contact: College administration or District Social Welfare Office

name: StartupTN Seed Grant Scheme
description: Seed funding support for startups registered with StartupTN
description_tamil: ஸ்டார்ட்அப் டிஎன்-இல் பதிவு செய்த தொடக்க நிறுவனங்களுக்கு விதை நிதி உதவி
benefits: Grants up to Rs. 10 lakhs for product development and market validation

eligibility.other: Registered with StartupTN, Should be in early stage (less than 5 years)

documents_required: Startup registration certificate, Business plan, Financial projections, Aadhaar of founders
application_process: Apply online through StartupTN portal

name: Chief Minister's Solar Powered Green House Scheme
name_tamil: முதலமைச்சரின் சூரிய சக்தி கிரீன் ஹவுஸ் திட்டம்
description: Subsidy for setting up solar-powered greenhouses
description_tamil: சூரிய சக்தி கிரீன் ஹவுஸ் அமைக்க மானியம்
benefits: 50% subsidy (maximum Rs. 28 lakhs per hectare)

eligibility.other: Farmers or FPOs with minimum 0.2 hectare land

documents_required: Land documents, Aadhaar card, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through District Horticulture Office

name: Tamil Nadu Skill Development Mission
description: Free skill training programs in various trades for unemployed youth
description_tamil: வேலையில்லாத இளைஞர்களுக்கு பல்வேறு துறைகளில் இலவச திறன் பயிற்சி
benefits: Free training, Stipend during training, Placement assistance

eligibility.other: Unemployed, Minimum 8th standard education

documents_required: Educational certificates, Aadhaar card, Unemployment certificate
application_process: Apply through nearest Government ITI or skill training center

name: Free Bus Pass for Women
description: Free travel in State Transport buses for women
description_tamil: பெண்களுக்கு அரசு பேருந்துகளில் இலவச பயணம்
benefits: Free unlimited travel in Tamil Nadu State Transport buses
documents_required: Any valid ID proof (Aadhaar, Voter ID, etc.)
application_process: Show ID proof to bus conductor

name: Namakku Naame Thittam (Self-Help Group Support)
description: Financial support and capacity building for women's self-help groups
description_tamil: பெண்களின் சுய உதவிக் குழுக்களுக்கு நிதி உதவி மற்றும் திறன் மேம்பாடு
benefits: Seed money, Revolving fund, Bank linkage support, Marketing assistance

eligibility.other: Member of registered SHG with at least 6 months of regular savings

documents_required: SHG registration, Member list, Bank account details, Savings records
application_process: Apply through District Rural Development Agency

name: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thogai Scheme
description: Monthly financial assistance of Rs. 1,000 to women heads of families
description_tamil: குடும்பத் தலைவியாக உள்ள பெண்களுக்கு மாதம் ரூ. 1,000
benefits: Rs. 1,000 per month directly to bank account

eligibility.income: Annual family income less than Rs. 2.5 lakhs
eligibility.other: Woman should be the head of the family

documents_required: Income certificate, Aadhaar card, Ration card, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through Tamil Nadu e-District portal

name: Free LPG Connection Scheme
description: Free LPG connection to Below Poverty Line families
description_tamil: வறுமைக் கோட்டிற்குக் கீழ் உள்ள குடும்பங்களுக்கு இலவச எல்பிஜி இணைப்பு
benefits: Free LPG connection with security deposit refund

eligibility.income: Below Poverty Line
eligibility.other: Should have BPL card, Should not have existing LPG connection in family

documents_required: BPL card, Aadhaar card, Address proof, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through Fair Price Shop or online

name: Tamil Nadu Agricultural Credit Waiver Scheme
description: Waiver of agricultural loans for small and marginal farmers
description_tamil: சிறு மற்றும் குறு விவசாயிகளுக்கு விவசாய கடன் தள்ளுபடி
benefits: Complete waiver of eligible agricultural loans up to Rs. 1 lakh

eligibility.other: Small/Marginal farmers with loans from cooperative banks or primary agricultural cooperative societies

documents_required: Land ownership documents, Loan details, Aadhaar card
application_process: Through respective banks where loan was taken

name: Free Gold for Marriage Assistance Scheme
description: 4 grams of gold and financial assistance for marriage of daughters
description_tamil: மகளின் திருமணத்திற்கு 4 கிராம் தங்கம் மற்றும் நிதி உதவி
benefits: 4 grams of gold coins, Rs. 25,000 cash assistance

eligibility.income: Annual family income less than Rs. 72,000
eligibility.age: Bride should be 18 years or above
eligibility.residence: Tamil Nadu resident for at least 3 years
eligibility.other: First marriage only

documents_required: Income certificate, Age proof of bride and groom, Marriage invitation, Aadhaar card, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through Tamil Nadu e-District portal before marriage

name: Free Milch Animal Scheme
description: Free milch animals (cow/buffalo) to landless agricultural laborers
description_tamil: நிலமற்ற விவசாய தொழிலாளர்களுக்கு இலவச பால் கறவை மாடு
benefits: Free milch cow or buffalo

eligibility.income: Below Poverty Line
eligibility.other: Landless agricultural laborer, Should have basic animal rearing facilities

documents_required: BPL card, Aadhaar card, Certificate from Village Administrative Officer
application_process: Apply through District Veterinary Office

name: Free Spectacles Scheme
description: Free spectacles to school children and elderly with vision problems
description_tamil: பார்வைக் குறைபாடு உள்ள பள்ளி மாணவர்கள் மற்றும் முதியவர்களுக்கு இலவச கண்ணாடி
benefits: Free eye testing and spectacles

eligibility.other: Vision problems requiring spectacles

documents_required: School ID (for students) or Age proof (for elderly), Aadhaar card
application_process: Through eye screening camps organized by Health Department

name: Annai Indira Gandhi Integrated Maternity Benefit Scheme
name_tamil: அன்னை இந்திரா காந்தி ஒருங்கிணைந்த மகப்பேறு நலத் திட்டம்
description: Maternity benefit for pregnant and lactating mothers below poverty line
description_tamil: வறுமைக் கோட்டிற்குக் கீழ் உள்ள கர்ப்பிணி மற்றும் பாலூட்டும் தாய்மார்களுக்கு மகப்பேறு நலன்
benefits: Rs. 6,000 in three installments during pregnancy and post-delivery

eligibility.income: Below Poverty Line
eligibility.other: First two pregnancies only

documents_required: BPL card, Pregnancy registration, Aadhaar card, Bank account details
application_process: Register at Primary Health Centre

name: Farmers' Pension Scheme
description: Monthly pension for small and marginal farmers above 60 years
description_tamil: 60 வயதிற்கு மேற்பட்ட சிறு மற்றும் குறு விவசாயிகளுக்கு மாதாந்திர ஓய்வூதியம்
benefits: Rs. 1,000 per month

eligibility.residence: Tamil Nadu resident for at least 5 years
eligibility.other: Small/Marginal farmer (land holding up to 2 hectares)

documents_required: Land ownership documents, Age proof, Aadhaar card, Bank account details
application_process: Apply through Village Administrative Officer

name: Free Hearing Aid Scheme
description: Free hearing aids to people with hearing impairment
description_tamil: காது கேளாமை உள்ளவர்களுக்கு இலவச செவித்திறன் கருவி
benefits: Free hearing aid device after audiometric assessment

eligibility.income: Below Poverty Line or Annual income less than Rs. 72,000
eligibility.other: Certified hearing impairment

documents_required: Medical certificate of hearing impairment, Income certificate, Aadhaar card
application_process: Through ENT camps organized by Health Department

name: Free Artificial Limbs Scheme
description: Free artificial limbs and assistive devices for differently abled persons
description_tamil: மாற்றுத்திறனாளிகளுக்கு இலவச செயற்கை உறுப்புகள் மற்றும் உதவி சாதனங்கள்
benefits: Free prosthetic limbs, wheelchairs, crutches, hearing aids, and other assistive devices

eligibility.other: Certified disability requiring assistive device

documents_required: Disability certificate, Medical prescription, Aadhaar card
application_process: Apply through District Differently Abled Welfare Office

name: Tamil Nadu Startup and Innovation Policy
name_tamil: தமிழ்நாடு தொடக்க நிறுவனம் மற்றும் புதுமை கொள்கை
description: Comprehensive support ecosystem for startups including funding, incubation, and mentorship
description_tamil: நிதி, இன்குபேஷன் மற்றும் வழிகாட்டுதல் உள்ளிட்ட தொடக்க நிறுவனங்களுக்கான விரிவான ஆதரவு
benefits: Seed funding, Incubation support, Mentorship, Networking opportunities, Tax benefits

eligibility.other: Innovative business model, Less than 10 years old

documents_required: Business registration, Business plan, Founders' documents, Financial projections
application_process: Register at StartupTN portal

name: Free Ration Scheme
description: Free rice and essential commodities to ration card holders
description_tamil: ரேஷன் அட்டைதாரர்களுக்கு இலவச அரிசி மற்றும் அத்தியாவசியப் பொருட்கள்
benefits: 20 kg rice per family per month (free for priority households)

eligibility.other: Valid ration card holder (Priority Household Card or Antyodaya Anna Yojana card)

documents_required: Ration card, Aadhaar card
application_process: Collect from designated Fair Price Shop

name: Free Mixer Grinder and Fan Scheme
description: Free mixer grinder and ceiling fan to newly married couples
description_tamil: புதிதாக திருமணமான தம்பதிகளுக்கு இலவச மிக்ஸி மற்றும் மின்விசிறி
benefits: Free mixer grinder and ceiling fan

eligibility.income: Annual family income less than Rs. 72,000
eligibility.residence: Tamil Nadu resident for at least 3 years
eligibility.other: First marriage only, Applied within 5 years of marriage

documents_required: Marriage certificate, Income certificate, Aadhaar card
application_process: Apply through Tamil Nadu e-District portal

name: Free Sanitary Napkins Scheme
description: Free sanitary napkins to adolescent girls and women
description_tamil: இளம் பெண்கள் மற்றும் பெண்களுக்கு இலவச சானிட்டரி நாப்கின்
benefits: Free pack of sanitary napkins every month
documents_required: Aadhaar card or School ID
application_process: Distributed through schools, Anganwadi centers, and Primary Health Centres

name: Amma Unavagam (Amma Canteen)
description: Subsidized nutritious meals at affordable prices
description_tamil: மலிவு விலையில் சத்தான உணவு
benefits: Breakfast at Rs. 5, Lunch and Dinner at Rs. 20, Curd Rice at Rs. 3

eligibility.other: Open to all

documents_required: None
application_process: Walk-in to nearest Amma Unavagam

name: Kalaignar Kanavu Illam Scheme
description: Free housing plots with basic amenities to urban poor
description_tamil: நகர்ப்புற ஏழைகளுக்கு அடிப்படை வசதிகளுடன் கூடிய இலவச வீட்டு மனைகள்
benefits: Free housing plot with basic infrastructure (roads, water, electricity)

eligibility.income: Below Poverty Line
eligibility.residence: Tamil Nadu urban area resident for at least 5 years
eligibility.other: Homeless or living in slums, Should not own house or land anywhere

documents_required: BPL card, Residence proof, Aadhaar card, Certificate of landlessness
application_process: Apply through Tamil Nadu Slum Clearance Board or local Corporation

name: Free Tailoring Machine Scheme
description: Free tailoring machines to poor women for self-employment
description_tamil: சுயதொழில் செய்ய ஏழை பெண்களுக்கு இலவச தையல் இயந்திரம்
benefits: Free electric tailoring machine

eligibility.income: Annual family income less than Rs. 72,000
eligibility.other: Should have completed tailoring training course

documents_required: Tailoring course certificate, Income certificate, Aadhaar card
application_process: Apply through District Social Welfare Office

name: Free Goat Rearing Scheme
description: Free goats to landless agricultural laborers and small farmers
description_tamil: நிலமற்ற விவசாய தொழிலாளர்கள் மற்றும் சிறு விவசாயிகளுக்கு இலவச ஆடுகள்
benefits: 10 goats (including 1 buck) per beneficiary

eligibility.income: Below Poverty Line
eligibility.other: Landless agricultural laborer or small farmer, Should have basic rearing facilities

documents_required: BPL card, Aadhaar card, Certificate from VAO
application_process: Apply through District Veterinary Office

name: Free Legal Aid Scheme
description: Free legal assistance to poor and marginalized sections
description_tamil: ஏழை மற்றும் ஒடுக்கப்பட்ட பிரிவினருக்கு இலவச சட்ட உதவி
benefits: Free legal consultation, representation in courts, preparation of documents

eligibility.income: Annual income less than Rs. 3 lakhs
eligibility.other: Women, SC/ST, Differently abled, Children, Senior citizens, or economically weaker sections

documents_required: Income certificate, Identity proof, Case documents
application_process: Apply at District Legal Services Authority or Taluk Legal Services Committee

name: Free Wi-Fi in Public Spaces
description: Free high-speed Wi-Fi in public spaces, bus stands, libraries
description_tamil: பொது இடங்கள், பேருந்து நிலையங்கள், நூலகங்களில் இலவச வைஃபை
benefits: Free Wi-Fi access in designated public spaces

eligibility.other: Open to all at designated hotspots

documents_required: Mobile number for OTP verification
application_process: Connect to TN Free WiFi network and authenticate with OTP
